alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 4:38AM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Box Butte, southwestern Dawes and east central Sioux Counties through 415 AM MDT... At 337 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Agate Bed National Monument, or 37 miles southwest of Chadron, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marsland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux
